_sText:
***********************************
Counter-Strike Source
***********************************
CS:S Multiplayer Map; aim_ShotGun_Ally
AUTHOR: Justin Strawn
E-MAIL: JustinMs66@hotmail.com
WEBSITE: http://www.csscobalt.com
XFIRE: JustinMs69

FILENAME: aim_shotgun_ally.bsp
FILESIZE: 905 kb
DATE RELEASED: 2 July 2006

CREDITS:
every bit of the map was created by Justin Strawn and nobody else.

INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS:
copy and paste ShotGun_Ally.bsp in this folder:
C:\Program Files\Valve\Steam\SteamApps\USERNAME\counter-strike source\cstrike\maps\
but make sure to replace "USERNAME" with your Steam username

DESCRIPTION:
this map is a long hallway with obsticles. it is only shotguns, and they are placed in different places on the map. you can also go outside and arround the main building.
screenshots are included with the zip file
